bibl.title: Regnal Formulas in Document Date and in the Imperial Oath.
bibl.note: I. Introduction. - II. Regnal Formulas in Oaths and Document Dates. - III. The Use of Kyrios in Abbreviated Regnal Formulas. - IV. Introduction of the Title Despotes. - V. A Catalogue of Comparative Regnal Formulas in Document Dates and in the Imperial Oath.
PACKMAN Zola M., Regnal Formulas in Document Date and in the Imperial Oath.
